loader=0x00002000
cpu0_secure_a=0x00000200
cpu1_secure_a=0x00000200
cpu0_secure_b=0x00000200
cpu1_secure_b=0x00000200
recovery=0x00000400
misc=0x00000400
cpu0_os_a=0x00000800
cpu1_os_a=0x00000400
cpu0_os_b=0x00000800
cpu1_os_b=0x00000400
dsp0_a=0x00002800
dsp0_b=0x00002800
dsp1_a=0x00002800
dsp1_b=0x00002800
dsp2_a=0x00002800
dsp2_b=0x00002800
rkstudio_a=0x00000200
rkstudio_b=0x00000200
root_a=0x00004000
root_b=0x00004000
userdata=grow
